title: GayStar! New in game club for LGBT and friends of players :)
body:
Hey guys looking for LGBT and friends of players to join our in game club GayStar! Let me know if you're interested and I'll send you an invite. Any level welcome. A friendly place to chat and have some casual / non casual games!

Vita

replies.body: hahaha yes pls this sounds positively fabulous {{champion:44}} , Ill be happy to join :D
Hey. I sent you a friend request
Ahh sorry I haven't kept track of this! The club is alive and well and an invite has been sent :)
plz add me i love this so much.. silver 4 jungler bahah im not sure if that matters

Sounds awesome, Id love to be a aprt of it <3 :D.

IGN: TheFirstBorn
My IGN is Star, does that mean i get automatic acceptance? :P
I know I'm super late to the party >_< but I'd love to join if the club is still active!
i would too. have you received a reply? so i know if i'd be wasting my time to ask to join aswell :p
I'd enjoy the club! :D IGN: Skeith1
Do you want some {{champion:77}} feel free to inv me :)
wheres my straight star? this is prejudice im calling the cops
Wah, is this still up? I'd love to join on both my accounts if I could? Lumenux and g5st!
Is this still alive haha I wouldn't mind joining :) Please add me!
Still recruiting, have a great discord chat going on too! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Ahh sorry I haven't kept track of this! The club is alive and well and an invite has been sent to the summoners I haven't yet friended :)
